1450078864139554818.text:
Recently we published tweets directed to women only.

We received feedback that they did not help to encourage more women to join the community, but the result was quite the opposite.

These tweets are now removed. They are also available 👇🏽 as screenshots for reference.

🧵 https://t.co/BNnXGHQKuJ

1444240747109265409.text:
Dear #WomenInTech, we need you! 

This year’s #AsyncAPI Conference is coming up, but we’ve only received CfPs from men so far. 

What can we do to change that? 

Help us find more awesome ladies who would enjoy submitting their talk ideas.

#WomenWhoCode 

https://t.co/vZ0W3SUdw2

1443878357960216614.text:
Are you a #workingmom that enjoys tech #hackathon?

Our month-long #AsyncAPI hackathon is coming up and we’d love to see more women join the fun! 

Don’t worry about pressure… you have a whole month to finish and submit your ideas! Ready?

https://t.co/Fbc06yvnmq
